tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to the Python and Database scripting workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb connection pools to connect to the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Connection Pools
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb connection pools to connect to the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Fetching Data
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb connection pools to fetch data from the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Binding Data
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb to bind data from the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab 5: PL/SQL
tutorials.description: Use PL/SQL procedures and functions to access data stored in Oracle databases

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Type Handlers
tutorials.description: Use type handlers to alter data fetched or sent to the Oracle database using the python-oracledb

tutorials.title: Lab 7: LOBS
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb to manipulate LOBs in Oracle databases

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Rowfactory Functions
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb to enable queries to return objects other than tuples

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Subclassing Connections and Cursors
tutorials.description: Use subclassing for hooking connection and cursor creation with python-oracledb

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Thick Mode
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb thick-mode for accessing advanced Oracle database functionality

tutorials.title: Lab 11: Query a JSON table from Python
tutorials.description: Work with JSON data in Oracle databases using Python's interface
